747250.name: Half-Life 2: Year Long Alarm
747250.description:
Year Long Alarm is a FREE single-player mod for Half-Life 2: Episode 2. The mod takes place during the Half-Life 2: Episode 1 timeframe, where the combine have chased Gordon Freeman to an abandoned mine outside City 17. Use everything at your disposal to dispatch the combine and escape their grasp.

WHAT TO EXPECT?

A short and polished Half-Life 2 experience that takes the player through multiple environments packed full of puzzles and combat. The mod is only 2 levels, and has a play time of roughly 30-50 minutes depending on your pace.

Source Files

The source files for Year Long Alarm have been packaged with the release.
747250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
